titles.title: HP816 Happy the souls to Jesus joined

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Happy the souls to Jesus joined,
And saved by grace alone;
Walking in all thy ways, we find
Our heaven on earth begun.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The church triumphant in thy love,
Their mighty joys we know;
They sing the Lamb in hymns above,
And we in hymns below.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thee in thy glorious realm they praise,
And bow before thy throne,
We in the kingdom of thy grace -
The kingdoms are but one.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The holy to the holiest leads;
From hence our spirits rise,
And whoso in thy statutes treads
Shall meet thee in the skies.
